item.title: your datastore connection deserves a name
item.description:
tl;dr: When multiple apps interact with the same database, nasty side-effects can happen: One app keeps the database busy, that all other apps stop responding. In this case, you are dealing with an incident that is difficult to debug due to a not that obvious root cause. Assigning a name to each database connection can make your life easier. It will reduce the time to debug by multiple hours and finding the root cause faster.

➡️ Want to see how it works? Checkout examples for redis, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, MySQL and HTTP.
